int8u halGpioGetPxIN ( int32u  gpio  ) 

Read single GPIO bit from PxIN.

Parameters:
io The io pin to use, can be specified with the convenience macros PORTA_PIN(), PORTB_PIN(), PORTC_PIN()
Returns:
Bit value: 1 if bit is set, 0 otherwise.
